title: Pentagon weighing options for U.S. military parade: Mattis
text:
Pentagon weighing options for U.S. military parade: Mattis Thursday, February 08, 2018 - 00:54 
The U.S. Defense Department is exploring potential proposals for a military parade to honor U.S. service members, Defense Secretary Jim Mattis said on Wednesday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
